# Io T Hardware Board

```text
aws-20210131/Resource/LoT/IoTHardwareBoard
```

```text
include('aws-20210131/Resource/LoT/IoTHardwareBoard')
```

|icon|card|element|group|
|---|---|---|---|
|![](IoTHardwareBoard.png)|![](IoTHardwareBoard.card.png)|![](IoTHardwareBoard.element.png)|![](IoTHardwareBoard.group.png)|



## card
### Load remotely
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tmorin/plantuml-libs/master/dist"
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the aws-20210131 bootstrap
include('aws-20210131/bootstrap')
' loads the IoTHardwareBoard element
include('aws-20210131/Resource/LoT/IoTHardwareBoard')
IoTHardwareBoardCard('io_t_hardware_board', 'Io T Hardware Board', 'Molestiae praesentium aut natus dolorem. Aut consequatur fugiat a consequatur ut.')
@enduml
```
### Load locally
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $INCLUSION_MODE="local"
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="../../.."
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the aws-20210131 bootstrap
include('aws-20210131/bootstrap')
' loads the IoTHardwareBoard element
include('aws-20210131/Resource/LoT/IoTHardwareBoard')
IoTHardwareBoardCard('io_t_hardware_board', 'Io T Hardware Board', 'Molestiae praesentium aut natus dolorem. Aut consequatur fugiat a consequatur ut.')
@enduml
```

### Load remotely
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tmorin/plantuml-libs/master/dist"
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the aws-20210131 bootstrap

' loads the IoTHardwareBoard element

IoTHardwareBoard('io_t_hardware_board', 'Io T Hardware Board', 'an optional tech field')
@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $INCLUSION_MODE="local"
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="../../.."
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
```

## group
### Load remotely
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tmorin/plantuml-libs/master/dist"
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the aws-20210131 bootstrap
include('aws-20210131/bootstrap')
' loads the IoTHardwareBoard element
include('aws-20210131/Resource/LoT/IoTHardwareBoard')
IoTHardwareBoardGroup('io_t_hardware_board', 'Io T Hardware Board', 'an optional tech field'){
  note as note
  the content of the group
  end note
}
@enduml
```
### Load locally
```plantuml
@startuml
' configures the library
!global $INCLUSION_MODE="local"
!global $LIB_BASE_LOCATION="../../.."
' loads the library
!include $LIB_BASE_LOCATION/bootstrap.puml
' loads the aws-20210131 bootstrap
include('aws-20210131/bootstrap')
' loads the IoTHardwareBoard element
include('aws-20210131/Resource/LoT/IoTHardwareBoard')
IoTHardwareBoardGroup('io_t_hardware_board', 'Io T Hardware Board', 'an optional tech field'){
  note as note
  the content of the group
  end note
}
@enduml
```
